title: GC delete range report errorï¼šencoding/hex: invalid byte
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
./tikv-server -V
 TiKV 
Release Version:   7.1.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   6d4f40c0a5d2d9f42edb738b0ba22d2ce1a9491e
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v7.1.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2023-03-27 11:43:45
Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release
2023-03-29T10:08:10.895+0800

./tidb-server -V
 Release Version: v7.1.0-alpha
Edition: Community
Git Commit Hash: b67c0321c05adde025aac4b2915eb8ad9dea19dc
Git Branch: heads/refs/tags/v7.1.0-alpha
UTC Build Time: 2023-03-27 11:42:41
GoVersion: go1.20.2
Race Enabled: false
TiKV Min Version: 6.2.0-alpha
Check Table Before Drop: false
Store: unistore
2023-03-29T10:08:11.421+0800

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
8c/16g

### Steps to reproduce
drop a db

### What did you expect?
data can be deleted

### What did happened?
[2023/03/29 10:57:20.478 +08:00] [ERROR] [gc_worker.go:793] ["[gc worker] delete range returns an error"] [uuid=61ca28a86340004] [error="encoding/hex: invalid byte: U+0072 'r'"]
[2023/03/29 10:57:20.478 +08:00] [ERROR] [gc_worker.go:237] ["[gc worker] runGCJob"] [error="encoding/hex: invalid byte: U+0072 'r'"]

comments_data.body: This issue is solved by pingcap/tidb#42630, and this should be a TiDB bug, only affecting the latest nightly.
